observation: When making multiple edits to the same file, doing them all at once can cause str_replace failures if earlier edits change the content that later edits target.
proposal: Make one edit at a time, verify with get_diagnostics or build between edits, then proceed to the next.

observation: Before renaming any symbol, it's critical to understand the blast radius â€” how many files and call sites will be affected.
proposal: Always call get_dependencies before rename_symbol, then run rename_symbol with preview=true first.

observation: str_replace fails with 'not found' when whitespace (tabs vs spaces, trailing spaces) doesn't match exactly.
proposal: When str_replace fails, use get_lines to see the exact whitespace at those line numbers, then copy the exact content.
